    • Method Detail

      • getText

        public java.lang.String getText()
        Returns:
        the actionbar.

      • getSpacer

        public net.md_5.bungee.api.chat.TextComponent getSpacer()
        Returns:
        the spacer used between items.

      • setSpacer

        public void setSpacer​(net.md_5.bungee.api.chat.TextComponent spacer)
        Sets the spacer used between each item in the actionbar. By default this is a single space.
        Parameters:
        spacer - component to use as a spacer.

      • add

        public void add​(ActionbarItem item)
        Adds a new item to the actionbar.
        Parameters:
        item - item to add.

      • remove

        public void remove​(ActionbarItem item)
        Removes an item from the actionbar.
        Parameters:
        item - item to remove.

      • reconstruct

        public void reconstruct()
        Reconstructs the actionbar. This will loop through all the added items and construct them into a string that is sent to the player.

      • prepare

        public void prepare()
        Sets the actionbar into a prepared state for the next time it is rendered. When the actionbar is in this state it will reconstruct all the items the next time send() is called.

      • send

        public void send()
        Sends the action bar to the player.
